unassigned.name: Backpack Check
unassigned.body_text: No more Item cards can be played.

unassigned.name: Buffet
unassigned.body_text: Search your Library for any number of distinct Mana cards and put them into your hand. Shuffle your Library.

body_text: Limit 1 per player on Battlefield. You must
already have a Head Coach on the Battlefield
to put this card on the Battlefield.
Draw phase: For each card you draw, you may look at the top 3 cards of your Library If you do this, you may put one of those cards in your hand. The other cards go to the bottom of your Library.
unassigned.name: Draw Coach
Generous Fan
unassigned.body_text: Draw phase: You may draw a card and take another Draw phase.

unassigned.name: Sympathetic Fan
unassigned.body_text: Resolution phase: When one of your Monsters is Knocked Out, you may draw up to 3 cards.

unassigned.name: Blade Arms
unassigned.flavor_text: Adds a slashing effect to Pounce and physical attacks.

unassigned.name: Do the Wave
unassigned.body_text: GROUP ATTACK. Does Xd4 where X is the number of Monsters you have in play.

unassigned.name: Drive Off
body_text: This Skill cannot be used if this Monster is
Declaration phase: Choose one opposing Monster.
Resolution phase: If this Monster was not
attacked during this turn and the
chosen Monster was not Knocked Out,
your opponent must discard that Monster
and all cards attached to it. You must then discard this Monster and all cards attached to it.

unassigned.name: Familiar Bell
unassigned.body_text: Search your Library for a Monster with the same name as a Monster in your Discard. Reveal that/those card(s). Put that/those card(s) in your hand. Shuffle your Library.

unassigned.name: Financial Planner
unassigned.body_text: Shuffle 1d4 discarded cards of your choice into your Library. You may take another Draw phase.

unassigned.name: Forehead Strike
unassigned.flavor_text: Vertical knifehand strike to the head.

unassigned.name: Headside Strike
unassigned.flavor_text: Diagonal knifehand strike to the side of the head or neck.

unassigned.name: Nonresistance
body_text: The attacking Monster takes the amount of Damage prevented.

unassigned.name: Proper Warmup
body_text: If this Monster is Knocked Out, discard this card.

unassigned.name: Stealth
unassigned.body_text: When attacking, roll 1d6. If 6, do not apply declared Defense. Can be improved with Power Up.
